issue.title: [Release] Make the source release verification script restartable
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7750](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7750). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Executing the verification script can take quite some time, so creating a new environment in case if anything fails is time consuming. 

Let the script reuse the same build directory for source release verification.
